attributes.action: give the public the right to deselect any MP after 6 months if they judge them to be failing in their job or abusing the system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After the revelations caused by the expenses scandal and with technology being as it is now.
There is no reason why the public could not be given the right to deselct ANY MP who they deem to be failing in their duties or who abuse the system in anyway

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament (http://www.parliament.uk/) or with relevant political parties.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
